name: Catan Map Generator Chat Bot
description:
I am the first ever Settlers of Catan chat bot! Strike up a conversation with me, your Catan Bot, and you will have the perfect board for your game every time! The Standard board is free, and the Expansion and Seafarers are available for purchase.

I even tell jokes, just ask me :D (spoiler alert: I'm not that funny)

I'll ensure you have the best board with these configurations:
- The maximum number of dots per intersection
- If neighbouring reds (6s/8s) are allowed
- Whether or not to use the default port locations
- If ports are able to be the same resource as whats on the shore
- Colour blind mode for those who need it!

More themes on the way! Please let me know what you would like to see in the comments! I will respond and address each one.

Beep...Boop...Happy Catanning!
